comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: Really happy with this print. The colors are great, and the paper quality is good too.

comments.author: Andrew
comments.description: You only get the picture, not the person holding it, something they don’t mention in the description, now I’ve got to find my own person

comments.author: Coen Jacobs
comments.description: This is my favorite poster. In fact, I’ve ordered 5 of them!

comments.author: Stuart
comments.description: This is a fantastic quality print and is happily hanging framed on my wall now.

comments.author: Stuart
comments.description: This will go great with my Hoodie that I ordered a few weeks ago.

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: Love this shirt! The ninja near and dear to my heart. <3

comments.author: Andrew
comments.description: I bought this thinking it was a nice green color, apparently it GREY! I’m color blind so I don’t care but my girlfriend says grey makes me look fat

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: I love grey hoodies! This is perfect with my grey Ninja shirt, when I get cold I throw this on and I can still be a Ninja.

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: The ninja silhouette is one of my favorite designs. This is a great product.

comments.author: student
comments.description: Perfect Hoodie for a Ninja!

comments.author: Coen Jacobs
comments.description: I have lots of hoodies, but none is as cool as this one!

comments.author: Dan
comments.description: I love hoodies, and ninjas, so what could be better than a ninja hoodie? Not much, if you ask me!

comments.author: Ryan
comments.description: This is the most bombastic hoodie in this shop, it’s soft and has the sly WooThemes ninja on it. Why wouldn’t you buy this?

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: This only gets 1 star because I don’t have this yet. I want it now!

comments.author: James Koster
comments.description: Perfect when you’re sat at your computer, waiting for the next batch of Woo Goodies to be released. The Patient Ninja is Patient.

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: The most comfortable hoodie I have ever owned!

comments.author: Magnus
comments.description:
This is my favorite hoodie!
If only it came in red as well!

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: Wonderful quality, and an awesome design. WooThemes ftw!

comments.author: Andrew
comments.description:
This t-shirt is awesome! Would recommend to everyone!
I’m ordering mine next week

comments.author: Gil-Dong Hong
comments.description: 저렴한 가격인것 같네요!

comments.author: Dan
comments.description: I thought I was buying a man holding a poster, but when it arrived it was just the poster. Cool poster though, so I’ll give it 3 stars!

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: I didn’t expect this poster to arrive folded. Now there are lines on the poster and one sad Ninja.

comments.author: James Koster
comments.description: Nice T-shirt, I got one in black. Goes with anything!

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: Very comfortable shirt, and I love the graphic!

comments.author: Stuart
comments.description: Great T-shirt quality, Great Design and Great Service.

comments.author: Stuart
comments.description: Another great quality product that anyone who see’s me wearing has asked where to purchase one of their own.

comments.author: Ryan
comments.description: This hoodie gets me lots of looks while out in public, I got the blue one and it’s awesome. Not sure if people are looking at my hoodie only, or also at my rocking bod.

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: Ship it!

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: Wonderful collection of WooThemes classics! A must buy for all Woo fans.

comments.author: Coen Jacobs
comments.description: This album gets a bit boring after you’ve listened to it more than once. Worth that first listen though.

comments.author: James Koster
comments.description: The most influential album of the last 25 years? This just might be it.

comments.author: Coen Jacobs
comments.description: Some rad tunes on this album!

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: Simple and effective design. One of my favorites.

comments.author: Magnus
comments.description: I like the logo but not the color.

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: Three letters, one word: WOO!

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: This hoodie is great for those chilly winter days. I love the WooNinja!

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: Perfect for the lady Ninja in your life!

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: He really is the cutest little man. Swoooon!

comments.author: Cobus Bester
comments.description: This album proves why The Woo are the best band ever. Best music ever!

comments.author: Maria
comments.description: Can’t wait to start mixin’ with this one! Irba-irr-Up-up-up-up-date your theme!
